profile_data.summary:
Award winning management consultant, strategy manager and business development leader with ~7.5 years of professional experience in leadership, corporate strategy, business strategy, growth, stakeholder management and P&L management across consulting, education, technology, gaming industries etc.

Professional Highlights
• Floc (2023-24)
* Senior Strategy Consultant: Charted firm's corporate strategy and market positioning as internal strategy consultant
• ThoughtNext (2020-22)
* Engagement Manager: Led teams of 4-7 strategy consultants, driving project delivery and stakeholder management in engagements worth ~100M USD across multiple functions, industries and geographies
* Senior Consultant: Engaged in strategic planning and market research to provide tailored, strategic recommendations to clients
• Coursopedia (2018-20)
* Chief Business Officer: Raised angel investment worth 500K USD, growing revenue by ~400% and user base by ~250%
* General Manager - Business Development: Led a cross-functional team of 70, generating ~5M USD in revenue
• upGrad (2017-18)
* Chief Admissions Counsellor: Led sales team of 65, managing revenue turnover of ~12M USD
• BYJU'S (2016)
* Business Development Associate: Led customer engagement strategy resulting in ~6% increase in user base

Academics
• MAM, Yale School of Management (World Top 15), Yale University (World Top 15) (2024-25)
• MBA + BEM, IE Business School (World Top 15), IE University (Spain Top 15) (2022-23)
• Executive Certificate, HEC Paris (World Top 15) (2021-22)
• MAM GNAM GNW, Saïd Business School (World Top 25), Univeristy of Oxford (World Top 10) (2024)
• MDP, IIM Indore (World Top 100) (2022)
• Diploma, FEB Zagreb (Croatia Top 3), University of Zagreb (Croatia Top 1) and SSBM Geneva (World Top 75) (2022)
• B.Tech, MIT Manipal (India Top 20), MAHE (India Top 15) (2012-16)

Passion
• Founder, Hardhitter Strength & Fitness (2015-22: Certified & published strength coach with ~84K online followers (~8 years in the fitness industry)
• Brand Ambassador, Protime Fitness, Division Supply etc.
• 7 national medals in powerlifting (~14 years of training experience)
• Competed in cricket, football, handball and badminton at state & national levels

Additional Information
• Education 2.0 Outstanding Leadership, Harappa upGrad 40U40 India's Best Managers & MBA World Summit Top 100 Global MBAs Awardee
• 39 X LinkedIn Community Top Voice
• Profile Expert, MBA and Beyond (2024)
• Advisory Board Member, Woxsen University (2024)
• Mentor, SuperCharger Ventures (2022-24)
• Member, IHIQS (Top 5% IQs) & Nova (Top 3% talent)
profile_data.headline: Management Consultant | Yale MAM (STEM) | IE MBA | HEC Paris | Oxford | Consulting | Education | Tech | Startups | Strategy & Operations | Business Development | Account Management | Harappa 40U40 | Education 2.0 Awardee

experience.description:
Floc (formerly Doss Games), officially called Genz Gameplays Private Limited is a VC backed web 3.0 based online gaming & e-learning platform for online creators and their communities. It was founded in 2021.

Responsibilities & Accomplishments
• Led a global team of 4 strategy associates and analysts advising the CEO on corporate strategy, market positioning pivot and international expansion, enhancing market share in Europe from 1% to 5% within 1 year as an in-house strategy consultant
• Assisted the CEO in pitch preparations, due diligence and investor relations, raising ~10M USD in seed funding from reputed investors like Titan Capital and Soma Capital
• Formulated a phased market entry & go-to-market strategy for expansion into markets like Spain, France, Germany, Portugal and Netherlands, effectuating 7 client deals worth ~15M USD 
• Built a phase-wise growth and marketing strategy for Floc’s online gaming platform, expanding user base from ~100K to ~1.5M within 1 year
• Secured company board's alignment and project funding by developing and presenting strategic expansion projects worth ~2M USD into India and Singapore
• Leveraged client feedback and market trends to advise CPO and product team on product development, launch and growth strategy for Floc’s edtech platform, increasing user adoption by ~17%
• Constructed and executed product marketing strategy involving micro-influencers, leading to 3X market penetration and ~8% less marketing cost
• Implemented data-driven approaches to measure the effectiveness of individual go-to-market strategies, facilitating continuous analysis and improvement, achieving ~9% improvement in global go-to-market efficiency
• Nominated to the Nova 111 List - Spain by the CEO of the company
• Only employee to be given employer sponsorship for further education and skill developement
experience.title: Senior Strategy Consultant

experience.description:
MBA and Beyond is an MBA application facilitator on a mission to create a top-notch value in every applicant’s journey and lead them to their business schools with perfect clarity of their goals and purpose. The company is an end-to-end strategic partner in all aspects of your MBA application.

Responsibilities & Accomplishments
• Evaluated & optimised profiles of ~300 aspiring MBA and masters aspirants and guided them on aspects like school selection, student-school fit, resume & linkedin building etc.
• Researched and stayed updated with latest market trends in context of international higher education including MBAs, MIMs and other advanced degrees to provide crisp and accurate advice to aspirants
experience.title: Profile Expert

experience.description:
Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), officially called Tata Consultancy Services Limited, is a globally leading IT services, consulting, and business solutions company and a subsidiary of the Tata Group. Founded in 1968, TCS specializes in providing innovative technology solutions, including IT services, digital transformation, cloud computing, and enterprise automation, to clients across diverse industries. TCS has a presence in over ~51 countries and a workforce of ~601K professionals.

Responsibilities & Accomplishments
• Worked in a team of 4 to collaborate with senior management of Tata Consultancy Services, India and university faculty on final impact project (MBA consulting project)
• Performed primary and secondary market research on present and future job prospects in India to restructure course curriculum and program delivery, enhancing customer engagement by ~40%
• Formulated a strategy to enable knowledge ecosystem for enhancing employment opportunities for ~125K students trained in TCS Youth Employment Program; enhanced placement opportunities by ~25% over 3-5 year time horizon
experience.title: MBA Consultant

experience.description:
Beam Suntory, officially called Beam Suntory Inc., is a globally renowned spirits company and a subsidiary of Suntory Holdings, specializing in premium alcoholic beverages. Founded in 2014 following the acquisition of Beam Inc. by Suntory, it is a leader in the production of iconic bourbon, japanese whisky, scotch, tequila, and other spirits. With a portfolio of globally recognized brands, Beam Suntory caters to a diverse consumer base across  ~101 countries.

Responsibilities & Accomplishments
• Worked in a team of 5, actively collaborated with the senior stakeholders of Beam Suntory, Spain as a part of MBA consulting project called Business Impact Lab Corporate Challenge
• Analysed customer behaviour and historic sales data and performed project feasibility analysis, market research & analysis, and sales forecasting for our project, "Roku Para Ti"; maintained client satisfaction rating of 9.5/10 throughout project
• Designed digitally a disruptive strategy based on virtual reality, traditional branding and social media marketing to enhance brand awareness of a signature gin in Spanish market; increased sales by ~30% on an annual basis over a 3 year timeline
• Presented the strategy to Chief Marketing Officer of the company for Spain along with 2 other senior leaders; awarded for being most innovative amongst 8 participating teams
experience.title: MBA Consultant

experience.description:
ThoughtNext Technology, also called BotsNext Technology is a management consulting, technology & IT consulting and IT services firm founded in 2015. It provide strategy as well as implementation consulting services.

Responsibilities & Accomplishments
• Head international teams of 4-7 consultants, working with marquee clients on projects worth a combined ~100M USD across APAC & EMEA regions
• Drove project scoping & budgeting, stakeholder management and end-to-end project delivery for 4 client engagements across education, technology, public sector industries etc.
• Presented compelling proposals to acquire 3 new clients; fortified relations with existing clients, selling ~3M USD in additional services
• Collaborated with UAE’s Ministry of Education to conduct feasibility analysis for digital transformation of 22 public schools; strategised deployment of smart classes, digitized teaching and student support processes, reducing online migration cost by ~4M USD and accelerating project timeline by ~25%
• Designed and executed a multi-year growth strategy of a travel-tech firm into rural tourism market, leading to ~42% increase in market penetration
• Collaborated with country heads in developing a long-term digital transformation strategy for a Fortune 500 manufacturing company, resulting in a ~2% increase in productivity and a ~5% decrease in product defects
• Implemented a customer acquisition platform for a Singapore based technology company, accelerating outbound sales cycle by ~40%
• Received the Leadership award and the Client Appreciation Award, and nominated by the firm for Forbes Asia 30 Under 30, Education 2.0 Outstanding Leadership Award and Harappa upGrad 40 Under 40 First Time Manager Award
experience.title: Engagement Manager

education.description:
Yale School of Management is ranked among the world's top 15 business schools and among US’ top 10. It is accredited by AACSB and NECHE, is located in New Haven, USA and was established in 1976. It is affiliated to Yale University and has ~13K alumni in ~176 countries.

The Master of Advanced Management (MAM) is a 1 year advanced masters degree for exceptional MBA students from ~23 countries.

The International MBA (IMBA) is IE's flagship 1 year long MBA program with students from ~65 countries.

education.description:
HEC Paris is ranked among the world's top 15 business schools and Europe's top 3. It is triple crown accredited and has campuses in Jouy-en-Josas, France and Doha, Qatar. It was established in 1881 and has ~81K alumni in ~153 countries.

The Master Track in Innovation Management & Entrepreneurship is a 7 month long, for-credit, graduate executive certificate programme with students from ~31 countries. It is worth 17.5 ECTS credits and grants students executive alumni status.

volunteer.description:
Comprised of representatives from faculty, students, alumni, and staff, the Council on Anti-racism and Equity (CARE) advises the dean and provides a mechanism for communication of needs and issues to senior leadership as they relate to anti-racism and equity at Yale SOM. 

Responsibilities & Achievements
• Selected to represent ~177 international students from 1 year degree programs at Yale SOM; met regularly with the 15 person council as well as with assigned subgroups to identify areas of focus and strategise ways to elevate areas of focus to senior leadership
• Participated in CARE initiatives such as the Donald H. Ogilvie ’78 Colloquium, the Who CAREs About That? Podcast etc.
• Liased with stakeholders within SOM and the New Haven community, serving as messengers for CARE and its work in their respective SOM networks (departments, cohorts, etc.)
• Supported internal and external CARE marketing efforts
• Provided feedback to CARE leadership about member experience and engagement

Yale School of Management is ranked among the world's top 15 business schools and among US’ top 10. It is accredited by AACSB and NECHE, is located in New Haven, USA and was established in 1976. It is affiliated to Yale University and has ~12K alumni across ~176 countries.

Responsibilities & Accomplishments 
• Selected as a cohort officer (an internal position to the MAM cohort) by the class representative, assisting the elected class representative in planning & executing multiple professional and frolic events for the Master of Advanced Management cohort of 2025

The Title IX Student Advisory Board at Yale University is a group of ~15 Yale College and graduate and professional students who meet periodically to provide guidance and student perspectives to the Title IX Office and the student government.

Responsibilities & Accomplishments
• Participated in ~10 meetings as a representative of Yale School of Management in the overarching university board, serving as a bridge between the Title IX offices of the two institutes
• Apprised the student government and the university's Title IX office on student perspectives around relevant areas, suggesting apt improvements
• Participated in the development and implementation of initiatives to promote a climate of inclusion and respect at Yale
• Discussed the insights gained after different initiatives like the Sexual Climate Survey and suggested processes to better educate students on the Title IX resources available at Yale

honors.description: The Case Competition World Cup is hosted by Management Consulted and co-hosted by Case Questions. It is the 5th largest case competition in the world with students from across the globe participating. In 2025, the competition attracted 253 case teams and ~1.2K students from across 101 schools and 17 countries. My team and I (team captain) won the competition by placing 1st from among the 253 participating teams and presenting to a live panel of judges comprising of the inventor of case interviews Mark Cosetino and senior leaders from companies like Mckinsey & Company, FTI Consulting, LEK Consulting, Nestle, Stax and Slalom.
honors.title: Case Competition World Cup Winner

honors.description: Honor Society is a diverse society of students and professionals from different walks of life and championing inclusive excellence. The financial award is given to gifted students and professionals to join the honor society.
honors.title: Financial Award

honors.description: The internal round of the Venture Capital Investment Competition is conducted by Yale School of Management and serves as the qualifiers for the regional round of the Global Venture Capital Investment Competition which is world’s largest venture capital competition with over 120 university and graduate school teams competing. My team and I finished as runners-up in the internal round of the Venture Capital Investment Competition (VCIC) at Yale School of Management.
honors.title: Runners-up
honors.issuer: Venture Capital Investment Competition and Yale School of Management

honors.description: Top performing Master of Advanced Management students at Yale School of Management receive 5 days of funding in their Global Studies Requirement Scholarship for pursuing international immersion, global study & exchange programs. These amounts last the entirety of the degree program. Funding amounts are destination specific and are reimbursed at 50% of lodging and meal expenses based on the US Department of State of the travel dates for the host university's city.
honors.title: Global Studies Requirement Scholarship

honors.description: The Dean’s Fellowship is a merit-based fellowship given to the top 5% candidates in MIT Sloan School of Management's applicant pool on the basis of an outstanding academic record, personal achievements and professional promise.
honors.title: Dean’s Fellowship

honors.description: The IE Wall of Fame serves as a platform to acknowledge and celebrate accomplished students, showcasing their achievements on designated campus wall panels. This initiative aims to inspire and motivate future students at IE by highlighting these individuals' success stories.
honors.title: IE Wall of Fame

honors.description: A need based scholarship given to the top 1% candidates in Yale School of Management's applicant pool on the basis of financial circumstances, exemplary academic performance, success across the professional career and impressive extra-curricular activities.
honors.title: Need-Aware Scholarship

honors.description: Floc offers 3 annual sponsorships to support employee coaching & educational programs for high-potential employees. I received a partial sponsorship by virtue of being recognised as a high potential leader by the senior management of the company. The grant fully covers an executive programme and partially covers expenses during my MAM degree.
honors.title: Sponsorship

honors.description: The LinkedIn Community Top Voices program recognizes noteworthy contributors who share their expertise and experience in a specific skill or skills through contributions to collaborative articles on LinkedIn. Members can earn a Community Top Voice Badge when members find you to be one of the most noteworthy contributors to collaborative articles for a particular skill. To earn a badge, one has to typically be in the top 5% of contributors and one of the first 2.5K badge holders for a particular skill. The top 5% of contributors are determined by looking at a variety of factors, including quality, engagement, and quantity of contributions. I have been named as a LinkedIn Community Top Voice 39 times across 39 unique skills including leadership, strategy, management, business strategy, management consulting, strategic consulting, consulting, problem solving, go-to-market strategy, strategic thinking, business development, strategic planning, team leadership, team management, stakeholder management, market research, project management, market analysis, analytical skills, educational consulting, higher education, education management, startup consulting, entrepreneurship, program management, business development consultancy, thought leadership, mentoring, sales, sales strategy, sales management, sales enablement, career counselling, analytical reasoning, e-learning, sales operations, customer retention, retail sales and service operations by virtue of being in the top 5% contributors in those skills.
honors.title: Community Top Voice

honors.description: A merit scholarship given to the top 5% candidates in Yale School of Management's applicant pool on the basis of exemplary academic performance, success across the professional career and impressive extra-curricular activities.
honors.title: Merit Scholarship

projects.description: Pursued this project as part of an MBA Co-op under the enterprise track of IE's Business Extension Module as a senior strategy consultant at Floc, a web 3.0 based online gaming & e-learning company. Actively collaborated with the company's CEO, leading an international team of 4 strategy associates to build the international expansion strategy of Floc in 5 prominent European markets namely France, Germany, Netherlands, Portugal and Spain. Conducted market research and analysis to develop individual market entry and go-to-market strategies for each of the counties. Also, conducted business development activities by establishing strategic partnerships worth ~15M USD across these markets. I secured an "Honors" grade on the project.
projects.title: Charting the International Expansion Strategy of the Company in Europe
